desc: This heat's just normal for a restaurant's standards!

source: Reward for inviting Xiangling to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1302], equip this card.
After $[A1302] equips this card, immediately use $[S13022] once.
When your $[A1302], who has this card equipped, uses $[S13022], she will also deal 1 Pyro DMG.
(You must have $[A1302] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
